snippet: The bride is a physical medicine and rehabilitation specialist in the Bronx; the groom, who is retired, was a high school teacher and before that an acting State Supreme Court justice, both also in the Bronx.
lead_paragraph: The bride is a physical medicine and rehabilitation specialist in the Bronx; the groom, who is retired, was a high school teacher and before that an acting State Supreme Court justice, both also in the Bronx.
